Name: Ninja Sneaking R
About the game: Ninja Sneaking is now powered up after 11 years! Idiot girl who invaded the enemy's castle. Kunoichi. Quickly conquer all 100 stages without being spotted by the enemy. Number of players: 1 to 4 Game Rules: Aim for the goal without being found by enemies. 'Operation Methods' Controller (XBOX type controller recommended) Left stick: Move left/right A button: Jump X button: Crawl / Stick to the ceiling B button: Head sliding Y button: Attack Start button: Menu display Keyboard operation (If a controller is not connected, the keyboard can be used to operate the controller.) A/D: Move left/right Space: Jump Enter: Creeping/Ceiling Ctrl: Head sliding Shift: Attack Tab: Menu display
